h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Captain Kalpa-Wave
content: Beyond this, Kalpa-Wave doesn't have too many other variations on his moves, so as long as you avoid those blood pools, you'll be able to cut him down to size, and gain the Spirit of Captain Kalpa-Wave to add to your collection.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Captain Kalpa-Wave'.
The content is as follows:
Beyond this, Kalpa-Wave doesn't have too many other variations on his moves, so as long as you avoid those blood pools, you'll be able to cut him down to size, and gain the Spirit of Captain Kalpa-Wave to add to your collection.
